backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing visitor messages using a List and exposing functions to submit a message and retrieve all messages.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent frontend fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, hook, and section in the React app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, dark theme initialization, and script loading the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying dark theme, smooth scrolling, and rendering all documentary sections with the StickyNav and Footer.
Component that animates its children into view using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/Figure.tsx: Simple figure component rendering an image with optional caption and styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with about text, quick-scroll links, social icons, and dynamic year attribution.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCards.tsx: Renders styled quote cards with decorative elements and optional author attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form with validation and message submission handling, including success and loading states.
frontend/src/components/sections/Documen: Documentary-style text section describing the life and legacy of Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan, with quotes and subheadings.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Image gallery with lightbox support, keyboard navigation, and animated thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background imagery, intro text, and smooth scroll button to documentary section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reflect: Reflection section presenting spiritual narrative and teachings with styled content and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/sections/ShrineL: Renders a shrine-focused section with animated counters and descriptive text about the location and spiritual significance. Includes a counter component driven by scroll-based number animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Storyte: Displays a storytelling card explaining the origin of the Nangiana name with decorative visuals and animated elements. Uses Card components and structured narrative text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Shows a grid of timeline items describing key stages of a spiritual journey with icons and animated appearance. Uses a predefined list of items rendered through AnimatedSection.
frontend/src/components/SpiritualModeTog: Toggle controlling ambient audio playback with session persistence and mute handling.
frontend/src/components/StickyNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll-based highlighting, mobile menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks which section ID is currently visible using an IntersectionObserver and returns the active section. Updates state when observed sections intersect the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes. Invalidates and refetches related queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Implements a count‑up animation that starts when an element enters view, respecting reduced‑motion preferences. Uses an easing function and IntersectionObserver to animate values.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions for Internet Identity, managing login, stored identities, and context access. Wraps AuthClient configuration and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion by watching the media query. Listens for changes and updates state accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Calculates and returns page scroll progress as a percentage, updating on scroll and resize. Uses event listeners to track scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Syncs a piece of state with sessionStorage under a given key. Initializes from storage and persists updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitVisitorMessa: Provides a mutation for submitting visitor messages through the backend actor with success and error toasts. Invalidates the messages query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for emerald/gold light–dark modes, and custom UI utilities including glassmorphism, drop caps, animation, and documentary styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS vars, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable handling, path aliases, build output rules, and a local proxy for API requests.
project_state.json: Describes the project's goals, architecture, known issues, and feature list for building a documentary-style Islamic website.
